Message: customer asked why does it not work on red or blonde hair. executive replied hi and thank you for your question ipl treatment works when the energy of the light is absorbed by melanin in the hair since light blonde grey and white hair do not contain enough or any melanin ipl treatment will never work on these hair colours we hope this helps feel free to ask any additional questions. executive replied hello we hope all is well we were wondering if we could still be of assistance to you if so please feel free to reach out to us again at any time we hope to hear from you soon. executive replied hello are we still able to help you feel free to let us know

Message: customer asked what does the taste feature do i understand that the strength features control how much coffee is being grinded but what does going from delicate to balanced to full body in the taste slider achieve does it change the preinfusion tine the pressure thanks. executive replied hi vincent thanks for reaching out and sharing this great question the taste feature changes a few parameters in the machine including the preinfusion and the pumppulse settings ie how fast the pump in the machine is pulsing if you would like your coffee to be on the stronger side we recommend selecting the full body option think of it as complementary to the coffee strength settings we hope this is helpful feel free to reach out with any further questions and enjoy your coffee
